android.car.remoteaccess

类 CarRemoteAccessManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.remoteaccess.CarRemoteAccessManager

  • public final class CarRemoteAccessManager
extends CarManagerBase
    CarRemoteAccessManager allows applications to listen to remote task requests even while Android System is not running.

    The remote task client registers to CarRemoteAccessManager to listen to remote access events. At RemoteTaskClientCallback#onClientRegistered it is required to share serviceId, deviceId and clientId with the cloud service which will use the IDs to wake the vehicle. At CarRemoteAccessManager.RemoteTaskClientCallback.onRemoteTaskRequested(java.lang.String, byte[], int), it starts executing the given task. It is supposed to call reportRemoteTaskDone(String) when it finishes the given task. Once the task completion is reported or the timeout expires, Android System goes back to either the previous power state or the specified power state.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarRemoteAccessManager.CompletableRemoteTaskFuture
      An interface passed from CarRemoteAccessManager.RemoteTaskClientCallback.
      static interface  CarRemoteAccessManager.NextPowerState 
      static interface  CarRemoteAccessManager.RemoteTaskClientCallback
      Listener for remote task events.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int NEXT_POWER_STATE_OFF
      The system shuts down to power off after completing the remote tasks.
      static int NEXT_POWER_STATE_ON
      The system remains ON after completing the remote tasks.
      static int NEXT_POWER_STATE_SUSPEND_TO_DISK
      The system goes into hibernation after completing the remote tasks.
      static int NEXT_POWER_STATE_SUSPEND_TO_RAM
      The system goes into deep sleep after completing the remote tasks.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • setRemoteTaskClient

        public void setRemoteTaskClient(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                CarRemoteAccessManager.RemoteTaskClientCallback callback)
        Sets the remote task client represented as CarRemoteAccessManager.RemoteTaskClientCallback.
        参数:
        executor - Executor on which callback is executed.
        callback - CarRemoteAccessManager.RemoteTaskClientCallback that listens to remote task events.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - When a remote task client is already set.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the given callback or the executor is null.

      • clearRemoteTaskClient

        public void clearRemoteTaskClient()
        Clears the remote task client previously set via setRemoteTaskClient(Executor, RemoteTaskClientCallback).

        After the remote task client is cleared, all tasks associated with the previous client will not be delivered and the client must not call reportRemoteTaskDone with the task ID associated with the previous client ID.

        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if callback is not registered.

      • reportRemoteTaskDone

        public void reportRemoteTaskDone(java.lang.String taskId)
        Reports that remote tast execution is completed, so that the vehicle will go back to the power state before the wake-up.
        参数:
        taskId - ID of the remote task which has been completed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If taskId is null.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the remote task client is not registered or not woken up.

      • setPowerStatePostTaskExecution

        public void setPowerStatePostTaskExecution(int nextPowerState,
                                           boolean runGarageMode)
        Sets the power state after all the remote tasks are completed.

        By default, the system returns to the previous power state from which the system woke up. If the given power state is NEXT_POWER_STATE_ON, Garage Mode is not executed.

        参数:
        nextPowerState - The next power state after the remote task is completed.
        runGarageMode - Whether to run Garage Mode when switching to the next power state.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If nextPowerState is not valid.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the remote task client is not registered or not woken up.
